Articles.Content:
Yop !

Work on a armored Fregate who can handle two Copter for refueling mission .

The only [MOD] i used for now is [tweakscale] to prevent too many Parts on the final craft .

EDIT : Erf , Part growing very fast !!!

Yop !

I got 235 Parts for now so is fine for me . Will try to stay under 500 max , 400 sould be better ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) !

I have all interior to make too , erf ! maybe make too version , 1 with low parts , & one full parts + interior !

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-13T22:32:39Z" title="07/13/2015 10:32  PM" data-short="8 yr">July 13, 2015</time> by ZLM-Master**
